title: Docs - Firestore reliability guide
abstract:
# Docs - Firestore reliability guide
Last reviewed 2023-07-07 UTC
Firestore is a NoSQL document database that lets you store, sync, and query data for your mobile and web applications, at global scale.
content:
## Best practices
- [Firestore best practices](https://cloud.google.com/firestore/docs/best-practices) - how to select your database location for increased reliability, minimize performance pitfalls in indexing, improve the performance of read and write operations, reduce latency for change notifications, and design for scale.
